definition: to wither/to dry up (of a plant)/to atrophy (of muscle, social custom etc)
to withdraw/to pull back/to contract/to shrink/to reduce/abbreviation/also pr. [su4]

pinyin: qiu2 xin1 shi4 ji1 rou4 wei1 suo1 zheng4

sentences.english: Purpose To study limb immobilization influencing on denervated muscle atrophy.
sentences.chinese: 結論肢體制動加速了失神經支配肌肉萎縮的發展。

sentences.english: This provides a laboratory way for diagnosing mulberry yellow dwarf disease.
sentences.chinese: 可作爲桑黃化型萎縮病病株的實驗診斷手段。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the related clinical factors of child brain atrophy.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究小兒腦萎縮的臨牀相關因素。

sentences.english: Objective To study the treatment of atrophic cholecystitis with stones in the neck of cholecyst .
sentences.chinese: 目的探討萎縮性膽囊炎並頸部結石的治療方法。

sentences.english: The moon may be shrinking, but not by much.
sentences.chinese: 月球或許在萎縮，但是不會太厲害。

sentences.english: But wilting is not enough: I want to bloody him.
sentences.chinese: 但是萎縮還不夠，我想讓他流血。

sentences.english: Economic shrinking has finally been overpassed now.
sentences.chinese: 現在經濟萎縮終於過去了。

sentences.english: Tyson and Altman were skeptical about avoiding short-term economic contractions.
sentences.chinese: 泰森和奧爾特曼對於短期內經濟是否會萎縮表示懷疑。

sentences.english: Lateral groups of nephrons are affected more than central ones, leading to patchy atrophy with variable degrees of severity.
sentences.chinese: 受累較中央組爲重，而導致嚴重程度不等的斑狀萎縮。

sentences.english: Objective To research the mechanism of Weiweikang Keli in treatment of chronic atrophic gastritis(CAG).
sentences.chinese: 目的研究萎胃康顆粒治療慢性萎縮性胃炎的作用。

sentences.english: Glaucomatous optic nerve atrophy results from the abnormal intraocular pressure.
sentences.chinese: 青光眼性視神經萎縮由異常的眼內壓所致。

sentences.english: The change of histopathology on the vulva lesion was consistent with sclerotic atrophic lichen.
sentences.chinese: 組織病理改變符合硬化性萎縮性苔蘚。

sentences.english: Clusters of atrophic prostatic acini with proliferative changes.
sentences.chinese: 簇狀萎縮的前列腺腺泡伴發增生性改變。

sentences.english: The funding crunch contributed to the rapid consolidation of the industry over the years.
sentences.chinese: 資金的萎縮導致了歷年來的快速產業整合。

sentences.english: Hawaii's famed white sandy beaches are shrinking.
sentences.chinese: 夏威夷著名白沙灘正在萎縮。

sentences.english: Natural resources are shrinking, degenerating and drying up.
sentences.chinese: 自然資源在萎縮，退化和枯竭。

definition: to pull back/to shrink/to contract/(physiology) systole
to intensify/to sharpen/to accelerate/to aggravate/to exacerbate/to embitter
to lead to/to create/to cause/to bring about
to reverse/to turn around (an undesirable situation)/(mechanics) torsion
to slow/to slow down (the pace of)
to improve/to take a turn for the better/improvement
